overview: Why did Moon Jae-in, a human rights lawyer who hated politics, become president? During five years at the Blue House, why didn't he use his power? Why did he just silently plant flowers while being sworn at by protesters? One by one, those who watched him reveal their hidden stories. "Why did he become president?" "Why did we want Moon Jae-in to be president at that time?" The puzzle pieces come together at last.
title: This is the President
